titles.title: A bill to establish new ZIP Codes for certain Wisconsin communities, and for other purposes.
A bill to establish new ZIP Codes for certain Wisconsin communities, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs.

committee.name: Senate Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs

bill.summary: This bill directs the U.S. Postal Service to designate a single, unique ZIP Code for each of Village of Somers, Village of Mount Pleasant, and Village of Caledonia, Wisconsin.
